DOC.brief_summary: The propose project aim build Duke University-specific longitudinal urologic surgery database . It use main resource support future research within Urology Duke University .
DOC.detailed_description: Specifically , database use follow future study . ( ) To characterize biomarkers/protein signature associate urological disease ; ( ii ) To clarify clinical role risk factor interaction early detection optimize treatment urological disease , improvement post-treatment quality life ; ( iii ) To develop algorithms nomogram accurately predict outcome urological disease . Retrospective review subject data prior Institutional Review Board approval prospective review data consent Institutional Review Board approval .
